MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH1 postcode area of Edinburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out a shutdown at 12:45pm to safely complete repairs on our underground cable network outside number 120 Chamber Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:26am on Tuesday, 20 April 2021
